lines.text:
[to his trumpet]
You happy little Grable bait!
Swine!
Pig!
That's the same as swine.
All right. Ham!

[Looking at the bicycle on the high wire he has to ride]
You want me want me to ride that thing?
Why not?
Up in the stratosphere?
Oh, you
[mumbles]
Who do you think I am - Mr. Jordan?

[Hanging off the high wire]
Help! Help!

[Aside to camera]
You know, this picture could end right here.

[Uncovering a side of meat in a freezer as he looks for Hot Lips]
Well, I'm getting warm. That's ham!
I don't know what came over me! I found myself saying things, and I didn't know why I was saying them.
Look, why don't you just run for Congress and leave us alone?

[to Catherine Vail]
Are you waiting for your broom?
I'll listen for you on "The Inner Sanctum."

[Staring at Lucia's very tight gown]
How'd you put that on - with a spraygun?
Look at this contract we signed for five months - two weeks guarantee!
You phoneys! You'll never work in Rio again!
Who wants to work? We're musicians!
This might be a plot to get rid of us! The coffee might be poisoned!
Yeah, who knows this co...
[He drops the cup]

[to Catherine Vail]
You got any tea?
Are you admitting you're a dirty coward?
No, a clean one!
If they hear us, we're dead ducks!

[Dropping the painting]
Whoops! Quack, quack!

[Hastily leaving the room]
Quack, quack, quack, quack!

[Knocking the bad guys unconscious with the pattycake routine]
That's what they get for not seeing our pictures!
